content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for your interest in my apartment in Mannheim. I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I know what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 300 Euro per month. How much are you asking for the apartment?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I am sorry, but I am not willing to accept that rental price. I would like to negotiate a higher price to maximize my gains. May I suggest that we discuss a rental price of 350 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am not willing to pay 350 Euro per month, what other options do I have?

I am a student, I don't have much money, so I can only afford 300 Euro per month

I am a responsible person, I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I don't want to make a bad impression by negotiating too low

I am a dependable person, I want to make sure that I can pay my rent on time, so I don't want to take a risk by negotiating too low

I am a responsible person, I want to maintain good relationships with my landlord, so I don't want to negotiate too low and make things difficult for myself in the future

I am a responsible person, I want to make sure that I can pay my rent on time, so I don't want to negotiate too low and potentially put myself in a bad financial situation
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I understand your concerns, Baihu Li. However, I am still not willing to accept the rental price of 300 Euro per month. I believe that my apartment is worth more than that, and I want to maximize my gains. May I suggest that we discuss a rental price of 350 Euro per month? This price would still be reasonable, but it would also allow me to achieve my financial goals.
name: Heinrich Heine
